translation.en: I told you not to have the Dom Perignon with it!
translation.es: ¡Te dije que no tomaras Dom Perignon con eso!

translation.en: I don't like the look of the crowds on the ropes.
translation.es: No me gusta cómo se amontona la gente en las cuerdas.

translation.en: I think we're gonna have some trouble once we get above Camp Three.
translation.es: Va a haber problemas arriba del Campamento Tres.

translation.en: I mean, you wanna top it on the 10th, yeah?
translation.es: Quieres llegar a la cima el 10, ¿no?

translation.en: What, are you saying we should team up?
I don't know, man. We have different styles, man.
All due respect, you're a hand- holder. I mean, the best, but...
translation.es: Tú eres una nana, la mejor nana, pero...

translation.en: I just believe that if you can't get up there yourself
translation.es: Yo creo que si no puedes llegar tú solo

translation.en: you shouldn't be on the mountain at all.
translation.es: no deberías estar en la montaña.

translation.en: You guide your team, I guide mine.
translation.es: Tú guías a tu equipo y yo al mío.

translation.en: I'm just suggesting that we work with each other instead of against.
translation.es: Solo sugiero que no trabajemos uno contra el otro.

translation.en: The only way we both summit, mate, is if we work together.
translation.es: Solo llegaremos a la cima trabajando juntos.

translation.en: - Yeah? - Yeah, I see the sense in it.
Who's gonna lead when we get up there?
translation.es: ¿Quién va a ser el líder allá arriba?

translation.en: Rob. If I say I will do it, it will be done.
translation.es: Rob, si digo que lo voy a hacer, lo haré.

translation.en: You gotta work with Ang Dorjee, because we're working together now.
translation.es: Tienes que trabajar con Ang Dorjee, porque trabajamos juntos.

translation.en: I'm just saying, if both of us...
translation.es: Yo solo digo, si los dos...

translation.en: We'll work together and we'll get the job done. Yes?
translation.es: Si trabajamos juntos, haremos el trabajo. ¿Sí?

translation.en: We're planning on stashing, what, eight bottles of O
translation.es: Vamos a almacenar ocho tanques de oxígeno...

translation.en: - Well, I'm not using O. - What do you mean?
translation.es: - Yo no voy a usar oxígeno. - ¿Qué quieres decir?

translation.en: You're not using oxygen at all?
- Come on, man. You know you want to. - English air. Don't need it.
translation.es: - Quieres usarlo. - Aire inglés. No lo necesito.

translation.en: Yeah, but Anatoli, you're guiding for Scott this year.
translation.es: Pero Anatoli, vas a ser el guía de Scott este año.

translation.en: You have people's lives in your hands. It's a job.
translation.es: Tienes vidas en tus manos. Es un trabajo.
Nunca lo he usado. Nunca lo usaré.

translation.en: Bigger problems if you run out.
translation.es: Si se te acaba, tienes problemas Mayores.

translation.en: I'll put some more bottles of O up there.
translation.es: Pondré más tanques de oxígeno allá.

translation.en: - All right, that'll be good. - All right.
Just so long as you guys are clear.
If you work for me, you use oxygen, otherwise you don't work for me.
translation.es: Si trabajan para mí, usan oxígeno o no trabajan para mí.

translation.en: You don't have to ask, mate.
translation.es: No me lo tienes que pedir.

translation.en: I've been up there before without O's, Rob. I don't need to do it with clients.
translation.es: He estado arriba sin oxígeno. No lo voy a hacer con clientes.

translation.en: All right, next we have to fix ropes.
translation.es: Lo que sigue: Arreglar las cuerdas.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Particularly above the Lhotse Face.
translation.es: Sobre todo, arriba de la Cara del Lhotse.

translation.en: Hillary Step need new fixed rope. And South- East Ridge as well.
translation.es: El Escalón de Hillary y el Risco Sureste necesitan nuevas cuerdas.

translation.en: My idea is that we work together and we fix ropes together.
translation.es: Mi idea es trabajar juntos y arreglar cuerdas juntos.

translation.en: All right, you and Lopsang maybe get together.
Talk about who wants to fix what and where, okay?
translation.es: Decidan quién arregla qué y dónde.

translation.en: Only essentials. I'm not gonna tell you what to pack, but be brutal. Okay?
translation.es: Solo lo esencial. No les voy a decir qué llevar, pero sean implacables.

translation.en: One pound down here is like 10 up there.
translation.es: Medio kilo acá abajo son 4,5 kilos arriba.

translation.en: What, and just like that, you kill my summit cappuccino.
translation.es: Y así de fácil, me quitas mi capuchino de la cima.
- La cámara se está muriendo. - Bien. 5 DE MAYO

translation.en: All right, it's gonna be a tough week.
translation.es: Va a ser una semana dura.

translation.en: But it is gonna be the best Friday of your lives.
translation.es: Pero será el mejor viernes de sus vidas.

translation.en: Yeah, what are we doing again on Friday?
- Now it's up to me, right? - Yes it is, yes it is.
translation.es: - ¿Ahora depende de mí? - Sí, así es.

translation.en: - I'll take three. - It's from Jan.
I knew it was gonna be a girl. I can't believe it.
translation.es: Sabía que iba a ser niña. No lo puedo creer.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, Doug. Cheers, mate.
Mid- July, as soon as I get back.
- You better sleep now, buddy. - Yeah, that's true.
translation.es: - Más vale que duermas ahora. - Sí, es verdad.

translation.en: Jan doesn't mind you being here?
It's okay. Jan's a climber, Jon, she gets it.
translation.es: Está bien. Jan escala. Ella lo entiende.

translation.en: What about you, Doug? What about your wife?
She's been fine with it, ever since we divorced.
translation.es: No le importa desde que nos divorciamos.

translation.en: She's been great with everything since then.
- I'm so sorry, buddy. - No, no.
No, no, no, I ask because Peach said to me,
translation.es: Te pregunto porque Peach me dijo:

translation.en: If you climb one more mountain, I will divorce you.
translation.es: Si escalas una montaña más, me divorcio.

translation.en: And you went ahead and then booked this trip!
translation.es: ¡Y te apuntaste para hacer este viaje!

translation.en: No, no, no, the worst part of it
translation.es: No, no, lo peor de todo...

translation.en: is that I kind of forgot to tell her.
You don't forget to tell her you're climbing Everest!
I forgot to tell her, I did.
All right. It's all on the table, here.
translation.es: Bueno, todo está sobre la mesa.

translation.en: It hurts, it's dangerous, it destroys relationships,
it's costing you all a small fortune.
Are there any negative aspects to this game?
I gotta ask the question, you know I do.
translation.es: Tengo que hacer la pregunta, ustedes lo saben.

translation.en: That's why. Thank you, Mr. Mallory.
Yasuko. Why are you climbing Everest?
translation.es: Yasuko. ¿Por qué vas a escalar el Everest?

translation.en: I have reached six of the seven summits, so...
translation.es: He llegado a seis de las siete cimas, así que...

translation.en: Of course, now I have to reach the seventh.
translation.es: ...claro, ahora tengo que llegar a la séptima.

translation.en: - Come on, tell 'em about the kids. - What?
- Tell 'em about the kids. - Whose kids?
Yeah, I have kids, but, I thought I told you,
translation.es: Sí, tengo hijos, pero creía que les había dicho

translation.en: there's an elementary school, back home.
translation.es: hay una escuela en donde vivo.

translation.en: And I've been going and talking to the kids there
translation.es: He estado hablando con los alumnos

translation.en: and they actually helped me raise some of the money to come
translation.es: y ellos me ayudaron a juntar algunos de los fondos para venir

translation.en: and gave me a flag to plant on the summit, and...
translation.es: y me dieron una bandera para la cima y

translation.en: So, I was thinking, maybe it's...
They see a regular guy can,
translation.es: Si los niños ven que un tipo normal puede

translation.en: you know, follow impossible dreams, maybe they'll be inspired
translation.es: seguir sueños imposibles, quizá eso los inspire a

translation.en: to do the same, I guess.

translation.es: Voy a escalar el monte Everest...

translation.en: Because to be able to climb that high
and see that kind of beauty that nobody ever sees,
translation.es: y ver la clase de belleza que nadie puede ver...

translation.en: it'd be a crime not to.
- There you go. - I like that.
translation.es: - Ahí lo tienes. - Me gusta eso.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I'm good, I'm better. I'm better now, I'm...
translation.es: Sí, estoy bien, estoy mejor. Ya estoy mejor, estoy...

translation.en: We go for the final ascent tomorrow.

translation.es: ¿Van a llegar a la cima el viernes?

translation.en: - It's your lucky day. - It is.
translation.es: - Es tu día de suerte. - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, I think we're gonna get a good window.
And did you go to the doctor, did you get a scan done?
- Did you see her? - Yeah, sure did.
And? Come on. What did she look like?
You know. Blonde hair, nice smile,
translation.es: Ya sabes. Pelo rubio, linda sonrisa...

translation.en: perfect height- to- weight ratio, she's gonna be a great climber.
A little me, a little you.
translation.es: Un poco de mí, un poco de ti...

translation.en: and our little Sarah, we'll all go climbing together.
translation.es: ...y la pequeña Sarah iremos a escalar juntos.

translation.en: Take it easy, now. You're gonna be okay.
translation.es: Tómalo con calma. Te vas a poner bien. CAMPAMENTO UNO 5.944 METROS

translation.en: We're gonna get you down the hill. All right?
Yeah, Dale, he doesn't look too good.
- We need to take him down. - Yeah.
You can't get Scott on the radio?
Nope. Nah, I think he's up ahead.
Best not to stare too long at the summit.
translation.es: Es mejor no mirar demasiado la cima.

translation.en: That's a long way to go, man.
Head down, one step at a time.
translation.es: Agacha la cabeza, un paso a la vez.

translation.en: Yeah, I did, he wasn't looking too good,
but Neal seemed to have a handle on the situation.
Tried to get you on the radio.
I'm going down to Camp One.
If he's not doing so well, I'm gonna take him down to Base Camp
translation.es: Si no se siente bien, lo llevaré al Base...

translation.en: and I'll head back up. You guys all right?
He can't be too far ahead of you, mate.
translation.es: No puede estar mucho más adelante de ti.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll make it down in half the time.
translation.es: Sí, bajaré en la mitad del tiempo.

translation.en: Rob to Guy, you up there, mate?
Yeah, Guy to Rob. I'm here.
translation.es: Sí, Guy a Rob. Aquí estoy.

translation.en: There you go, I got the old sly rotter.
translation.es: Ahí estás. Ya veo al viejo desgraciado.

translation.en: Listen, I think you're on the wrong mountain, there.
translation.es: Creo que estás en la montaña equivocada.

translation.en: Look, I can't talk, we gotta get out of here.
translation.es: No puedo hablar. Nos tenemos que ir.

translation.en: All right, mate. Well, listen, you take care on the kiddie slope.
translation.es: Está bien. Tengan cuidado en la pendiente para niños.

translation.en: I'm gonna get back to the real thing.
translation.es: Voy a seguir escalando en serio.

translation.en: Yeah, don't worry, Rob. I'll keep an eye on you.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Rob. Te cuidaré.

translation.en: - Look at me. - I'm fine, mate.
Look, I'm telling you, I'm all right.
Don't do that to me again!
I'm gonna drop back with Frank, he's struggling a bit, all right?
translation.es: Voy a bajar con Frank. Está batallando un poco.

translation.en: Let's get him on the oxygen.
Rob Hall to Scott Fischer, Rob Hall to Scott Fischer,
Mountain Madness, how do you copy?
I've been down to Base Camp, and I'm back at Camp One.
translation.es: Ya bajé al Campamento Base, estoy en el 1.

translation.en: What, you're not gonna rest up a day first? No?
Scott, you sound a little rough.
No way, José, what, miss out on all the fun?
translation.es: De ningún modo. ¿Y perderme toda la diversión?

translation.en: That's a lot of up and down in one day, even for you, Scott.
translation.es: Es mucho subir y bajar para un día, hasta para ti, Scott.

translation.en: You know what they say, man.
It's not the altitude, it's the attitude.
translation.es: No es la altitud, es la actitud.

translation.en: Are you sure you're gonna be okay?
Just taking a shot of dexamethasone now.
translation.es: Me estoy inyectando un poco de dexametasona.

translation.en: Well, just don't push yourself too hard, okay? Over and out.
translation.es: No te exijas demasiado. Cambio y fuera.

translation.en: Rob, I've just been over to Mal's to get a weather update.
translation.es: Mal me informó sobre el pronóstico del tiempo.

translation.en: And it could still go north, but, if it doesn't
translation.es: Todavía puede dirigirse al norte, pero si no...

translation.en: it's gonna hit sometime on the 11th, I reckon.
translation.es: ...creo que habrá una tormenta el día 11.

translation.en: This mountain makes its own weather. We're keeping an eye on it.
translation.es: La montaña hace su propio clima. Estaremos pendientes.

translation.en: Yeah, sure, just letting you know.
Why do we do this to ourselves?
You know, I never told Krakauer this
when he was asking us why we climb Everest.
translation.es: ...cuando preguntó por qué escalamos el Everest.

translation.en: - on a mountain, any mountain... - Yeah?
It's just like it's a cure.
You know, I'm starting to wonder.
for the rest of your life you'll be a guy that got to the top of Everest.
translation.es: ...pero el resto de tu vida serás alguien que escaló el Everest.

translation.en: I just hope I get there.
Just hope I get there, and get home.
translation.es: Espero llegar a la cima y luego a casa.

translation.en: Little bit of wind, up higher.
translation.es: Un poco de viento más arriba.

translation.en: I mean, if it picks up, we can always come back down.
translation.es: Si se pone peor, siempre podemos bajar.

translation.en: I'm hoping it's gonna die down after sundown.
translation.es: ¡Espero que se calme después del ocaso!

translation.en: Well, we don't go if it doesn't calm.
translation.es: Si no se calma, no subiremos.

translation.en: I talk to Scott when he comes here.
What's Rob's... What's Rob's team doing?
translation.es: ¿Qué va a hacer el equipo de Rob?

translation.en: He wants to see if this passes.
Come out and take a look.
At least somebody up there loves us.
Okay, everyone. We got a window.
We don't know how long it's gonna last, but we're gonna go for it.
translation.es: No sabemos cuánto vaya a durar, pero la vamos a aprovechar.

translation.en: Be ready in half an hour.
We'll have a 2:00 p.m. turnaround, let's climb this thing.
translation.es: Hay que dar la vuelta a las 2:00 p.m. Vamos a escalar.

translation.en: Now the South Africans were late out of Camp Three.
translation.es: Los sudafricanos salieron tarde del Campamento Tres.

translation.en: They never made it into Camp Four. Probably got caught up in it.
translation.es: No llegaron al cuatro. Probablemente los alcanzó.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it hit us all night,
translation.es: Sí, nos cayó toda la noche...

translation.en: but now there's nothing. Absolutely nothing.
So, it's definitely worth a shot.
translation.es: Así que vale la pena tratar.

translation.en: I'll radio out and tell everyone the news.
translation.es: Les daré la noticia a todos.

translation.en: Yeah, ring Jan and tell her that we're heading out.
translation.es: Llama a Jan y dile que vamos a la cima.

translation.en: I'll call you, Helen, in 12 hours when we get to the summit.
translation.es: Te llamaré en 12 horas cuando lleguemos a la cima.
La vuelta es a las 2:00 p.m.

translation.en: Good luck, and Godspeed to you all.
translation.es: Buena suerte y buen viaje a todos.

translation.en: I'll see you guys up there. - Take it easy, Scott. - Let's do it.
translation.es: - ¡Nos vemos arriba! - Tómalo con calma, Scott.

translation.en: Gonna get a couple hours of sleep, and I'll be right behind you.
translation.es: Voy a dormir un par de horas y los seguiré.

translation.en: - Yeah, okay. - See you at the top. Have fun, Pittman.
You got the ropes for the Hillary Step?
translation.es: ¿Tienes cuerdas para el Escalón de Hillary?

translation.en: Not a chance we can go faster here. It's too difficult.
translation.es: Aquí es imposible. Es demasiado difícil.

translation.en: I had an operation a couple years ago, on my eyes. That might be it.
translation.es: Me operaron los ojos hace dos años. Puede ser eso.

translation.en: You guys go in front of us.
All right, Beck, let's sit you down.
I need to send you down with someone.
No, I don't wanna go down, Rob.
- No, you gotta go down. - I don't wanna go down.
translation.es: - Tienes que bajar. - No quiero bajar.

translation.en: You can wait here for half an hour. Beck, listen to me.
translation.es: Puedes esperar aquí media hora. Beck, escúchame.

translation.en: If it gets better by then,
join in the queue and keep going up.
translation.es: ...ponte en la fila y sigue subiendo.

translation.en: But if it doesn't get better, Beck, I'm sorry, mate, it's over.
translation.es: Pero si no, lo siento, se acabó.

translation.en: The Sherpas are gonna go up and drop off the extra oxygen at the South Summit
translation.es: Los sherpas van a subir y dejar oxígeno extra en la Cima Sur.

translation.en: then I'm gonna send one of them down for you. Is that clear?
translation.es: Luego mandaré a uno por ti. ¿Está claro?

translation.en: Sandy, do you want to go down?
Look, Lopsang, I'm gonna make it to the top. Do you understand?
translation.es: Voy a llegar a la cima. ¿Entiendes?
- De acuerdo. - No voy a regresar.

translation.en: There is no rope! No rope.
Yeah, they should have been fixed.
Do you have more in your pack?
Lopsang has the rope. He's not here!
translation.es: Lopsang tiene la cuerda. ¡No está aquí!

translation.en: Listen, we got a problem, here, mate.
There's no fixed ropes on the traverse to the Hillary Step, over.
translation.es: No hay cuerdas colocadas para atravesar el Escalón de Hillary.

translation.en: Yeah, I've got Ang Dorjee here, but there's no sign of Lopsang.
translation.es: Tengo a Ang Dorjee aquí, pero no hay señas de Lopsang.

translation.en: So me, Neal, and Toli are gonna have to set some new ones, over.
translation.es: Así que Neal, Toli y yo vamos a poner unas nuevas.

translation.en: One step at a time, Doug.
translation.es: Un paso a la vez, Doug.

translation.en: Come on, Dougie. Deep breaths, Dougie.
Come on, mate, keep it on, keep it on.
Deep breaths, Dougie, hang on. Hang on.
- I know you can, pal. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Yo sé que puedes, amigo. - Sí.

translation.en: I don't wanna see you back here a third time, mate.
translation.es: No quiero verte aquí una tercera vez.

translation.en: There's no fixed ropes above the South Summit.
translation.es: No hay cuerdas fijas arriba de la Cima Sur.

translation.en: but we're sorting that situation out now.
Ran out of juice, waiting. Cold.
translation.es: Se me agotó la energía esperando. El frío.

translation.en: I don't wanna run out of oxygen up there.
translation.es: No quiero quedarme sin oxígeno allá arriba.

translation.en: Lou, Stuart, and John Taske just turned back.
translation.es: Lou, Stuart y John Taske están regresando.
Estaban debajo de la Cima Sur.

translation.en: How are the conditions, so far?
I hope we're not looking at another year with no clients at the top.
translation.es: Espero que no sea otro año sin clientes en la cima.

translation.en: Well, if they don't get a move on pretty soon,
they're out of time, aren't they?
And what's Jon gonna say about that in his article?
translation.es: ¿Y qué va a decir Jon sobre eso en su artículo?
Habla Rob. Muchachos... EL ESCALÓN DE HILLARY 8.760 METROS

translation.en: We just lost Lou, Stu, and John Taske.
translation.es: ...perdimos a Lou, Stu y John Taske.

translation.en: What's going on, what's the holdup?
We still have Toli and Neal at the top of the Step
translation.es: Mandamos a Toli y Neal arriba del Escalón...

translation.en: We're at the base of the Step, over.
translation.es: Estamos en la base del Escalón. Cambio.

translation.en: Doug's just behind me, I left him behind to scoot forward.
translation.es: Doug está detrás de mí. Lo dejé para darme prisa.

translation.en: Yeah, I got eyes on you right now, yep, that's me. Let's move as...
translation.es: Te estoy viendo. Sí, ese soy yo. Hay que seguir...

translation.en: We'll start moving everybody up, as soon as we get the all clear.
translation.es: Vamos a subir a todos tan pronto nos den el visto bueno.

translation.en: Rob to base, Rob to base, how copy, Helen?
translation.es: Rob a base, Rob a base. ¿Me oyes, Helen?

translation.en: - You all right? - Copy, Base Camp to Rob.
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien? - Te oigo, Campamento a Rob.

translation.en: Anyone managed to find out where he is, over?
- Yo, dude! - Look, where are you, mate?
We got a real logjam, here at the Hillary Step, over.
translation.es: Hay un embotellamiento en el Escalón de Hillary.

translation.en: We're more than an hour behind!
People are just sitting here, using up their oxygen.
translation.es: La gente está sentada, inhalando su oxígeno.

translation.en: Get here as soon as you can.
Yeah, I got a little problem with my eyes.
translation.es: Sí, tengo un problemita con los ojos.

translation.en: There's a logjam below the Hillary Step. It's crazy.
translation.es: Hay un embotellamiento antes del Escalón de Hillary. Es una locura.

translation.en: Nah, I can't, promised Rob I'd wait for him.
translation.es: No puedo. Le prometí a Rob esperarlo.

translation.en: - You mind if I go first? - Why?
I'm running pretty low on O.
We've had the all- clear on this end.
translation.es: Nos dieron la señal para cruzar.

translation.en: I'm gonna stay here with Yasuko, until we get a clear line.
translation.es: Me voy a quedar con Yasuko hasta que haya una cuerda libre.

translation.en: I'll be here till I get a visual on Doug, over and out.
translation.es: Yo me quedaré aquí hasta ver a Doug. Cambio y fuera.

translation.en: Come here. I'm so proud of you, Yasuko.
translation.es: Ven aquí. Estoy muy orgulloso de ti, Yasuko.

translation.en: Rob to Base, Rob to Base.
translation.es: Rob a Base, Rob a Base.

translation.en: Rob, this is Helen, hello? Where are you?
I'm on the top of Everest, Helen, we made it.
translation.es: En la cima del Everest. Llegamos.

translation.en: We copy you loud and clear, Rob.
It's wonderful to hear your voice up there.
translation.es: Es maravilloso oír tu voz allá arriba.

translation.en: Who are you with, again, say?
translation.es: Dime de nuevo con quién estás.

translation.en: At the moment, I'm with Mike and Yasuko.
translation.es: En este momento estoy con Mike y Yasuko.

translation.en: - Headed down, Rob. - Now you have to go.
translation.es: - Voy para abajo, Rob. - Ahora tienes que bajar.

translation.en: Jon K has already been and gone.
translation.es: Jon K ya estuvo aquí y se fue.

translation.en: Doug is just coming over the horizon.
translation.es: Doug está apareciendo en el horizonte.

translation.en: Beck was having a problem with his eyesight.
translation.es: Estaba teniendo problemas con la vista.

translation.en: He waited on the southeast ridge, on the Balcony
translation.es: Estaba esperando en el Risco Sureste, en el Balcón...

translation.en: for the first people that came back, over.
And I guess you'll be leaving right away, yes?
translation.es: Y tú vas a partir de inmediato, ¿sí?

translation.en: We'll be off in a few minutes.
Just as soon as I see Doug, we'll be heading back down, over.
translation.es: Tan pronto vea a Doug empezaremos a bajar. Cambio.

translation.en: Right, understood. Well, that's terrific, Rob.
We're all keeping our fingers crossed for Doug.
translation.es: Estamos cruzando los dedos para que llegue Doug.

translation.en: My stomach's not so good, man.
translation.es: Mi estómago no está muy bien, amigo.

translation.en: Hey, Roberto. Where are the rest of your guys?
translation.es: Roberto. ¿Dónde está el resto de tu gente?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm pretty sure my whole team
translation.es: Porque estoy casi seguro que todo mi equipo...

translation.en: Don't worry, I won't tell Krakauer.
translation.es: No te preocupes. No se lo diré a Krakauer.

translation.en: Well done, mate. I had a mixed bag.
translation.es: Bien hecho, amigo. Yo tenía todo tipo de gente.

translation.en: I'll have to give you this year.
Scott, you really don't look too good.
translation.es: De verdad tienes muy mal aspecto.

translation.en: Come on, mate, let's get him down.
I'm just trying to sort the O. I can't find any full ones.
translation.es: Estoy revisando el oxígeno. No encuentro uno lleno.

translation.en: There's full bottles, I saw 'em on the way up.
translation.es: Hay tanques llenos. Los vi de subida.

translation.en: No, I'm pretty sure you should have another look.
No, I just have, they're not full.
translation.es: No, los acabo de revisar. No están llenos.

translation.en: Look, mate, I checked twice, all right?
You guys keep going, mate, I'll catch up.
translation.es: Ustedes sigan adelante. Yo los alcanzaré.

translation.en: Doug, Doug. Doug, listen to me.
- It's way too late. It's over. - No, come on!
Listen to me, mate, I'm sorry,
but I gotta turn you around.
It's right here, man. It's right here.
I'm not coming back next year, man, it's my last chance.
translation.es: No voy a regresar. Es mi última oportunidad.

translation.en: You gotta let me do this.
- Let's get it done. - All right.
There ain't no hope of getting
I'm not seeing too well, Jon. I'm freezing.
translation.es: No estoy viendo bien. Me estoy congelando.

translation.en: You'll be okay. Mike's right behind me.
translation.es: Vas a estar bien. Ya viene Mike.

translation.en: Guy to Rob, you read me, mate?
Guy to Rob, are you there?
Good on you, Doug. Come on.
Come on, let's get you up.
- Need more O. - No, Doug, we can't give you more O.
translation.es: - Necesito más oxígeno. - No podemos darte más.

translation.en: We gotta get down to the South Summit, come on.
translation.es: Hay que bajar a la Cima Sur.

translation.en: Guy Cotter to Everest Base Camp. You there, Helen?
translation.es: Guy Cotter al Campamento Base. ¿Estás ahí, Helen?

translation.en: Guy, this is Helen, how's it going?
I got a clear view of the summit
and we've still got climbers up there. They're not any of ours, right?
translation.es: Todavía hay alpinistas ahí. No son nuestros, ¿verdad?

translation.en: We got three up, and they're all on their way down.
translation.es: Tenemos tres arriba y ya vienen para abajo.

translation.en: Well, what are they doing there so late?
They had a 2:00 turnaround time, they're way past it.
translation.es: Tenían que bajar a las 2:00. Se atrasaron.

translation.en: Yeah, we got cloud coming up through the valley, it's a lot of it.
translation.es: Vienen nubes por el valle. Muchas.

translation.en: Thanks, I'm calling them now, Guy.
Rob, come in, this is Helen.
Rob, come in, this is Helen.
Easy, easy, easy, Dougie! There you go.
It's Mike, Beck. What are you doing here?
We got a problem with Beck.
Hey, Mike, we're getting low on O. We gotta move.
translation.es: Mike, tenemos poco oxígeno. Tenemos que apresurarnos.

translation.en: Gonna get you to stand up, okay?

translation.es: - Yo llevaré a Yasuko. - Eso es.

translation.en: Mike, Harold, Ang Dorjee, put the brakes on, guys, we got a problem.
translation.es: Mike, Harold, Ang Dorjee, deténganse, tenemos un problema.

translation.en: We're out of gas. Need to keep moving, come on.
translation.es: No tenemos oxígeno. Tenemos que seguir.

translation.en: Mike, Harold, do you copy? I need someone...
translation.es: Mike, Harold, ¿me oyen? Necesito que alguien...

translation.en: I need someone to come back up with oxygen, over.
translation.es: Necesito que alguien regrese con oxígeno.

translation.en: Doug, come on, mate, come on!
Has anyone got eyes on Ang Dorjee?
Mate, I've just had Ang Dorjee go past me, heading down, over.
translation.es: Ang Dorjee me acaba de pasar. Va para abajo. Cambio.

translation.en: Can you stop him, can you turn him around? I need someone to come back up now.
translation.es: ¿Puedes pararlo y mandármelo? Necesito que alguien suba.

translation.en: Base Camp, do you copy, over?
Helen, please. I need a bottle of gas at the top of the Hillary Step.
translation.es: Por favor. Necesito un tanque de oxígeno arriba del Escalón de Hillary.

translation.en: I can't get him down without it.
Understood that you need a bottle of oxygen at the bottom of the Hillary Step.
translation.es: Entendido que necesitas oxígeno debajo del Escalón de Hillary.

translation.en: We are sending it up to you, as soon as we can.
translation.es: Te lo mandaremos lo antes posible.

translation.en: At the top, at the top.
The last thing I said to Ang Dorjee was
translation.es: Lo último que le dije a Ang Dorjee fue:

translation.en: Please, leave two bottles of gas at the South Summit.
translation.es: Por favor, deja dos tanques de oxígeno en la Cima Sur.

translation.en: there's oxygen at the South Summit, right?
There's no oxygen at South Summit.
translation.es: No hay oxígeno en la Cima Sur.

translation.en: Ang Dorjee stashed four bottles there, Harold.
translation.es: Ang Dorjee dejó cuatro tanques ahí, Harold.
Creo que me va a llevar una...

translation.en: half an hour to get back up to the South Summit.
translation.es: ...media hora ascender a la Cima Sur.

translation.en: If you don't have oxygen, mate, don't come up, don't come up.
translation.es: Si no tienes oxígeno, amigo, no subas.

translation.en: I'm coming up to you, Rob.
Doug, come on, mate, come on!
Rob, can you get yourself down?
Caro, we're not at that point, yet.
translation.es: No hemos llegado a ese punto.

translation.en: Rob, can you let us know who you're with?
Come on, Dougie, come on, mate. One more effort, come on.
Rob, what is Doug's state of consciousness?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el estado de consciencia de Doug?

translation.en: He collapsed after we ran out of oxygen.
translation.es: Se colapsó cuando se nos acabó el oxígeno.

translation.en: Okay, give him eight milligrams of dexamethasone.
Go ahead, Guy, I got you, mate.
Rob, I suggest you get yourself down.
You know you're doing no good up there.
Now, we've got people that we can send up to help Doug
translation.es: Tenemos gente que puede ayudar a Doug...

translation.en: but you've gotta get yourself down, do you understand?
I mean, come on, man, we're playing with a man's life here.
translation.es: Estamos jugando con la vida de un hombre.

translation.en: There's no way I'm leaving Doug behind.
translation.es: No voy a dejar a Doug atrás.

translation.en: No, we gotta keep moving, we're in some trouble.
translation.es: Tenemos que seguir. Estamos en un aprieto.

translation.en: Yeah, Helen's gonna need some help
so I'm gonna try and make my way back. Okay?
translation.es: Voy a tratar de regresar. ¿De acuerdo?
Ve tú y manda a Anatoli.

translation.en: Send Anatoli back with some O.
translation.es: Manda a Anatoli con un poco de oxígeno.

translation.en: No, I'm not leaving you behind, Doug.
translation.es: No te voy a dejar atrás.

translation.en: No, Doug, come on, you're coming with me!
I need 10 good minutes, Doug, come on!
Ten minutes. We'll get to the bottom of the Step.
translation.es: 10 minutos. Llegaremos al fondo del Escalón.

translation.en: Hold that down. Come on, come on! Get those chairs!
No, no, no, no. Come on, Dougie!
Doug! I'm gonna go to the South Summit to get oxygen.
translation.es: ¡Doug! Voy a ir a la Cima Sur por oxígeno.

translation.en: Beck! Stop! That's the wrong way!
Here, I found some half- empty ones.
They're out there, I need help!
I go find them! You stay here!
Here, give me that, come on.
Why haven't I heard from you? Why hasn't anybody called me?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me has llamado? ¿Por qué no me llama nadie?

translation.en: They've been hit by a storm, Jan. It's really bad.
translation.es: Les pegó una tormenta. La situación es grave.

translation.en: he was still on the summit at 4:00.
There's at least 13 people stranded up there
translation.es: Hay por los menos 13 personas varadas ahí...

translation.en: and, well, the storm is getting worse.
- Helen, do you understand? - Helen! Give me an update!

translation.es: Manda a Ang Dorjee allá arriba.

translation.en: Jan, yeah, we will get him.
translation.es: Jan, sí, lo vamos a mandar.

translation.en: And I will call you the minute I hear from him.
translation.es: Y te llamaré tan pronto tenga noticias de él.

translation.en: As soon as I hear from him.
- Where is he? - Guy, I haven't heard from him.
- Guy... - Just hang on, hang on.
Rob? It's Guy, where are you?
Guy, I've been doing that for the last two hours.
translation.es: Guy, llevo dos horas haciendo eso.

translation.en: - Just keep your energy, mate. - Helen.
Once you catch a break, you move, you know the drill.
translation.es: Cuando haya una oportunidad, te mueves. Sabes qué hacer.

translation.en: We've got a stash of oxygen on the South Col.
translation.es: Tenemos oxígeno en el Collado Sur.

translation.en: - Whoever needs it can have it. - That's the way, thank you.
translation.es: - Para el que lo necesite. - Excelente. Gracias.

translation.en: Mal's team are gonna go up, they're gonna mount a search as soon as they can.
translation.es: El equipo de Mal va a subir. Los van a buscar cuando puedan.

translation.en: Anyone who's going, we're gonna leave at dawn, weather permitting.
translation.es: Los que vayan, saldremos al amanecer, si el tiempo lo permite.

translation.en: Go let Ed know what's going on, I'll be right behind you.
translation.es: Avisa a Ed. Voy detrás de ti.

translation.en: Rob. Rob, can you hear me?
David Breashears has a stash of oxygen at the South Col that we can use.
translation.es: David Breashears tiene oxígeno en el Collado Sur a su disposición.

translation.en: All right, mate, we're organizing a team, we're coming to get you.
translation.es: Estamos organizando un equipo y vamos por ti.

translation.en: Rob, talk to me, please. Pick up.
translation.es: SÁBADO 11 DE MAYO Rob, háblame, por favor. Contesta.

translation.en: Is there any word on the others?
Anatoli managed to get three clients back from the South Col last night,
translation.es: Anatoli logró traer a tres clientes del Collado Sur...

translation.en: but Beck and Yasuko are still out there.
They're trying to mount a search
but everyone who's been up there is exhausted.
translation.es: ...pero todos los que subieron están exhaustos.

translation.en: Rob, where are you? We're sending people for you.
translation.es: Rob, ¿dónde estás? Vamos a mandar gente por ti.
No puedo, no me puedo mover.
Ya no me puedo mover. Ya no.

translation.en: Hey, mate. Yeah, I know. I know, mate. I know.
translation.es: Sí, ya lo sé. Ya lo sé, hombre.

translation.en: But you gotta keep on moving.
I can't feel my hands, they're frozen.
translation.es: No siento las manos, están congeladas.

translation.en: I gotta de- ice my mask.
That's good. Yeah, you gotta get that mask working. Yeah?
translation.es: Muy bien. Haz que la máscara funcione.

translation.en: The sun's gonna come up and,
you know, you can get warmer, you can get moving.
translation.es: Te vas calentar y podrás moverte.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a little help.
Okay, Rob, you gotta get yourself down. Where are you?
translation.es: Rob, tienes que bajar de ahí. ¿Dónde estás?

translation.en: In that little dip just below the South Summit.
translation.es: ...en la pequeña pendiente debajo de la Cima Sur.

translation.en: All right. You can do this.
You just gotta, you know, pull yourself up out of that dip
translation.es: Tienes que salir de esa pendiente...

translation.en: and slide the rest of the way.
I'm gonna need a little help.
We've got some Sherpas coming up there with tea, oxygen.
translation.es: Están subiendo sherpas con té y oxígeno.

translation.en: You just gotta come on down, mate.
- To Rob? - Patch her through, yeah?
Let's just try it. Let's just...
Put the sat phone next to the radio.
translation.es: Pon el teléfono junto al radio.

translation.en: Yeah, if anyone can motivate him to move, then Jan will.
translation.es: Si alguien puede motivarlo para moverse, es Jan.

translation.en: Guy to Rob. Can you read me?
- We're just getting... - Rob, are you there?
Rob, I've got Jan for you.
Hi, sweetheart, how are you doing?
But the sun'll warm you soon.
translation.es: Pero el sol te calentará pronto.

translation.en: We're sending people up to you with tea and O's.
translation.es: Te mandamos gente con té y oxígeno.

translation.en: But you've gotta get moving. Rob? Can you hear me?
translation.es: Pero tienes que moverte, Rob. ¿Me oyes?

translation.en: You've gotta get your circulation going.
You do it... You do it right now.
It's gonna take all we got
translation.es: Va a requerir toda nuestra energía...

translation.en: Helen, it's Mike here. Do you copy?
Come in, Mike. What do you got?
did not make it back to camp.
Okay, Mike. Thanks for letting us know.
Helen Base Camp. Helen Base Camp.
There is a very bad storm again.

translation.es: - Tú decide, Ang Dorjee. - Lo siento.

translation.en: We'll try to again when the storm's passed.
translation.es: ¡Trataremos de nuevo cuando pase la tormenta!

translation.en: We'll leave some tea and oxygen here. Sorry.
translation.es: Dejaremos un poco de té y oxígeno aquí. Lo siento.

translation.en: We have to tell Rob they're not coming.
translation.es: Hay que decirle a Rob que no van a ir.

translation.en: The boys have hit a bit of high wind.
translation.es: Los chicos se encontraron con vientos fuertes.

translation.en: And your best shot is gonna be to get lower.
translation.es: Tienes mejores posibilidades si bajas un poco.

translation.en: I think I can hang out here another night.
translation.es: Creo que puedo aguantar otra noche.

translation.en: We'll try again first thing, okay?
translation.es: Trataremos de nuevo a primera hora.

translation.en: He's just below the South Summit.
translation.es: Está debajo de la Cima Sur.

translation.en: He's got oxygen, but it's iced up.
translation.es: Tiene oxígeno, pero la llave está trabada.

translation.en: We don't know whether he's been able to free it.
translation.es: No sabemos si ha podido abrirla.

translation.en: You have to get him down before dark. He won't survive another night.
translation.es: Tienen que bajarlo hoy. No sobrevivirá otra noche.

translation.en: But the storm's come back, real bad.
translation.es: Pero la tormenta ha vuelto. Es muy fuerte.

translation.en: We can't get anyone up to him tonight.
translation.es: No podemos mandar a nadie esta noche.

translation.en: He might as well be on the moon.
translation.es: Como si estuviera en la luna.

translation.en: Can you put me on with him again?
Hold on. Give me a sec.
I might have a little frostbite.
translation.es: Quizá tenga un poco de congelación.

translation.en: I'm looking forward to making it all better.
I can't wait for you to come home.
translation.es: Me muero de ganas de que llegues a casa.

translation.en: Will you call her that for me?
I don't think I'm gonna get to meet her.
translation.es: No creo que la vaya a conocer.

translation.en: If anyone can make it, you can.
translation.es: Si alguien puede superar esto, eres tú.
Por favor, no te preocupes demasiado.

translation.en: I'm here, come on. Come on.
David Breashears and the IMAX team are gonna get him down to Camp One.
translation.es: David Breashears y el equipo de IMAX lo llevarán al Campamento Uno.

translation.en: We don't even know how, but he is alive.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sabemos cómo, pero está vivo.

translation.en: we can't get him down the Icefall.
translation.es: ...no podemos bajarlo de la Cascada de Hielo.

translation.en: Okay, what do we need? We need a helicopter, right?
Yeah, but they can't take a helicopter up that high
translation.es: Sí, pero no pueden mandar un helicóptero tan alto...

translation.en: because the air is too thin.
We should try, but it is one heck of a risk.
translation.es: Hay que tratar, pero el riesgo es enorme.

translation.en: And he's not in a good way, Peach,
translation.es: Y no está en buen estado.

translation.en: so I don't want you to get your hopes up too high.
translation.es: No quiero que tengas falsas esperanzas.

translation.en: I know you are. Come on.
Yes, I'd like the number of the American Embassy in Kathmandu, Nepal.
translation.es: El número de la embajada de EE. UU. en Katmandú, Nepal.

translation.en: No, you listen, sir, my husband's already died once
translation.es: No, escuche usted, mi esposo ya murió una vez...

translation.en: as you'll have seen on the news.
Trust me, having him die a second time is not gonna play well on CNN.
translation.es: Morir dos veces no va a causar una buena impresión en CNN.

translation.en: Look like you are, a little bit.
Rob's still up there right now.
And Doug? What's he up to?
I don't know, no one's ever tried to fly higher than Base Camp before,
translation.es: Nadie ha volado más alto que el Campamento Base

translation.en: they're gonna give it a go.
You find an LZ, just mark it out with whatever you can.
translation.es: Si encuentras un lugar para aterrizar, márcalo.

translation.en: Okay, worth a try. Thanks, Guy.
translation.es: Bueno, vamos a tratar. Gracias, Guy.

translation.en: Got a chopper coming in, we need to make an LZ.
translation.es: Viene un helicóptero. Hay que marcar un lugar.

translation.en: We got a chopper coming in!
Clear everyone back to the tents!
Thanks. Keep it clear, keep this whole area clear.
You land here, we'll never get back up.
translation.es: Si aterrizas, no vamos a poder despegar.

translation.en: We can't get any more out. It's as light as we're gonna get it!
translation.es: ¡No podemos sacar nada más! ¡Es lo más ligero posible!

translation.en: Come on! You can do it!
Come on, buddy. You're nearly there.
Yeah, it's just him, just one! There.
translation.es: ¡Sí, solo él, solo una! Eso es.

translation.en: I'm going to lift the tail up, to fly us over the edge.
translation.es: Voy a levantar la cola para volar sobre el borde.

translation.en: Fall a bit, until the blades catch on the air.
translation.es: Vamos a caer hasta que la hélice agarre el aire.
- Lo que usted diga. - Muy bien.

translation.en: Come on, let's get you inside.
